citation.article-title: Archaeoglobus fulgidus gen. nov., sp. nov.: a new taxon of extremely thermophilic archaebacteria.

p.s: Description of Archaeogloblls fulgidus sp. nov.
Archaeogloblls fulgidus (ful.gi'dus L. masc. adj. fulgidus shining, on account of its fluorescence under the UV microscope)
Optimal growth at 83°C GC content of DNA 46 mol% (TM).
Deposited with the German Collection of MiCll> organisms, Braunschweig-Stöckheim.
Isolated from the geothermally heated sea floor at Vulcano, Italy.
